yams.parser
Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--yams.parser.Parser
public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

Parses the users file. Invokes the Lexer automatically.

Author:
Qian Qiao qq01@doc.ic.ac.uk

Constructor Detail

Parser

public Parser()
Constructs a new parser. If a parser is constructed this way, then the method parse(StringBuffer Program) should be used.

Method Detail

parse

public LineList parse()
               throws LexerException,
                      ParseException
Parses the program.

Returns:
a collection of the Line that represents the user's input program.
Throws:
LexerException - if the lexer finds an error
ParseException - if the parser finds an error

parse

public LineList parse(java.lang.StringBuffer program)
               throws LexerException,
                      ParseException
Parses the program given by the argument.

Parameters:
program - the program input.
Returns:
a collection of the Line that represents the user's input program.
Throws:
LexerException - if the lexer finds an error
ParseException - if the parser finds an error
